sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_980b3809dbb3e70005d2147a3a961919
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>rm_story</collection><condition>current.isNewRecord() || !(gs.hasRole('admin'))</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Set MF for Story</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	current.u_member_firm = current.opened_by.u_member_firm;
	current.u_member_s_firm = current.opened_by.u_member_firm.getDisplayValue();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admritwij</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-02-21 11:23:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>980b3809dbb3e70005d2147a3a961919</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set MF for Story</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_980b3809dbb3e70005d2147a3a961919</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admsherine</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-12-16 06:53:54</sys_updated_on><template/><u_roles/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=980b3809dbb3e70005d2147a3a961919"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_4555941d0fc9eb001ef9f55be1050e28
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>task</collection><condition>!gs.hasRole('admin') && !gs.hasRole('coe_scrum') && !gs.hasRole("coe genesis")</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>member firm List</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	var ttype = current.getTableName();
	if(ttype!='chat_queue_entry'){
	var user = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	user.addActiveQuery();
	user.addQuery('sys_id', gs.getUserID());
	user.query();
	if(user.next()){
		var loggedInUser= gs.getUserID();
		//var loc = user.u_member_firm;
		/*var qc = current.addEncodedQuery('u_member_firmISNOTEMPTY^u_member_firm='+loc+'^ORopened_by'+user+'^ORwatch_listDYNAMIC'+user);*/
		var loc = user.u_member_firm.getDisplayValue();
		var memberFirm=user.u_member_firm;
		
		//var qc = current.addEncodedQuery('u_member_s_firm='+loc);
		
		
			if(!gs.hasRole('x_detc_itsm_global.itil_global_std'))
				{
					if(!gs.hasRole('coe_scrum_team_member'))
						{
				var qc = current.addEncodedQuery('u_member_firmISNOTEMPTY^u_member_s_firm='+loc+'^ORopened_by='+loggedInUser+'^ORwatch_list='+loggedInUser+'^ORu_raised_for_mf='+memberFirm);
						//	gs.addInfoMessage(qc);
						}
					else
						{
							
						}
					
			}
			else
				{
				 var qc = current.addEncodedQuery('u_member_s_firm=COE - Admin');
			}

		}
	
	}
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bavinash</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-08 10:25:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4555941d0fc9eb001ef9f55be1050e28</sys_id><sys_mod_count>83</sys_mod_count><sys_name>member firm List</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_4555941d0fc9eb001ef9f55be1050e28</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admsherine</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-12-16 06:47:15</sys_updated_on><template/><u_roles/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4555941d0fc9eb001ef9f55be1050e28"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>task</collection><condition>current.isNewRecord() || !(gs.hasRole('admin'))</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="task">sys_class_name!=rm_defect^sys_class_name!=rm_sprint^sys_class_name!=rm_release_scrum^sys_class_name!=rm_epic^sys_class_name!=rm_story^EQ<item display_value="Defect" endquery="false" field="sys_class_name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="rm_defect"/><item display_value="Sprint" endquery="false" field="sys_class_name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="rm_sprint"/><item display_value="Scrum release" endquery="false" field="sys_class_name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="rm_release_scrum"/><item display_value="Epic" endquery="false" field="sys_class_name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="rm_epic"/><item display_value="Story" endquery="false" field="sys_class_name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="rm_story"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Member Firm Field Value</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	//var gf = current.addEncodedQuery('sys_class_name!=rm_defect^sys_class_name!=rm_epic^sys_class_name!=rm_sprint');
	// Add your code here
	//if(gf)
	
if(current.assignment_group!='423a978f373207004d0e83dcb3990ed7') // COE support group
	{
	current.u_member_firm = current.opened_by.u_member_firm;
		current.u_member_s_firm = current.opened_by.u_member_firm.getDisplayValue();
	//gs.addInfoMessage('inside');
	}
	
	else
		{
			current.u_member_firm='0ad5349adb5e63c06d0b18df4b9619f6';
			current.u_member_s_firm='COE - Admin';
		}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admsherine</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-09-25 14:34:39</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b43e7d261bc4c010059a65b82d4bcbae</sys_id><sys_mod_count>35</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Member Firm Field Value</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b43e7d261bc4c010059a65b82d4bcbae</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admsherine</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-12-16 06:54:42</sys_updated_on><template/><u_roles/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b43e7d261bc4c010059a65b82d4bcbae"/></record_update>
